column4: My brothers laptop is a Dell Inspiron 1545, and it seems that the wireless is messed up. He can connect on ethernet, and the internet works. But when he connects with wireless, it connects, but theres no internet...how can I fix this?
Have you tried ndiswrapper with the windows driver for the wireless card?
Try ndiswrapper...I've had similar probs with a different wireless card....but never the less, you should try it . If it doesn't work you are no farther out
